sentences: Delegates responded to draft text on Articles 2.3 and 3.14.
The EU noted the need to take into account ongoing, relevant discussions under other SBI agenda items, the AWG-LCA and AWG-KP.
Saudi Arabia, for the G-77/CHINA, observed that Annex I communications have provided little information on how policies and measures have impacted on developing countries.
The EU explained that it was difficult to ascertain potential impacts and requested developing countries to provide information on impacts experienced.
AUSTRALIA called for a focus on actual rather than potential impacts.
